title: HYST_1 Function Block
description:
TC_MS determines the last cycle time, that is the time since the last call of
the module has passed. The time comes in milliseconds.
name: HYST_1

input.name: In
input.description: The input value to be evaluated against the threshold limits.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper threshold for the hysteresis comparison.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower threshold for the hysteresis comparison.

output.name: Q
output.description: Boolean output indicating if the input is above the high threshold.

output.name: win
output.description: Boolean output indicating whether the input is within the hysteresis window.
